==Interactables==
===Blackboard===
{{Dialogue Start}}
; (Before completing ''An Eye for an Eye'')
:'''Blackboard:''' (Written on it is some common knowledge easily understandable to children.)

; (After completing ''An Eye for an Eye'')
:'''Blackboard:''' (The blackboard displays a number of economic principles, with some sociological discourse mixed in.)
{{Dialogue End}}

===Table===
{{Dialogue Start}}
; (Before completing ''An Eye for an Eye'')
:'''Table:''' (There are some story books, detective novels, and a collection of papers published by the [[Fontaine Research Institute]].)

; (After completing ''An Eye for an Eye'')
:'''Table:''' (There are some papers published by the Fontaine Research Institute, as well as some books related to economics.)
{{Dialogue End}}

===Storybook===
{{Dialogue Start}}
; (Before completing ''An Eye for an Eye'')
:'''Storybook on the Bookshelf:''' (A purple pressed flower is tucked between the pages.)

; (After completing ''An Eye for an Eye'')
:'''Storybook on the Bookshelf:''' (A faint fragrance lingers on the pages.)
{{Dialogue End}}

===Notes===
Tearing off all three notes by the [[Teleport Waypoint]] spawns a [[Common Chest]] containing {{Item|Primogem|x=2}} and {{Item|Credit Coupons|x=30}}.

{{Dialogue Start}}
; (Investigate the first note)
:'''A note posted on the wall:''' “10 Coupons for Welfare Meals and fortune slips. Interested parties can visit Supply Warehouse 2 to discuss details.”

; (Investigate the second note)
:'''A note posted on the wall:''' “Join us, and destroy the loudspeaker!”

; (Investigate the third note)
:'''A note posted on the wall:''' “Another day squandered. Got nothing other than a bowl of disgusting [[Minty Bean Soup]]...”

; (After tearing off all three notes)
:'''Maupoli''': Did you take down all the notes posted on the wall? That's supposed to be my job...
:'''Maupoli''': I... I'm so touched, someone actually took my job!
:'''Maupoli''': Here, take these [[Credit Coupons|Coupons]]! Thank you!
{{Dialogue End}}
